text: The Battle of Bucaramanga () was a battle of the Thousand Days' War in Colombia. The battle took place between 11 and 13 November 1899. The liberal troops, commanded by General Rafael Uribe Uribe, tried to take the city of Bucaramanga, but were repelled by the nationalist General Vicente Villamizar. The Liberals lost 1,000 dead and 500 wounded. ==References== Bucaramanga 1899 Bucaramanga 1899 Category:History of Colombia Category:1890s in Colombia
title: Battle of Bucaramanga (1899)
